table.mysql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{TABLE.articles}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `title` varchar(255) default NULL, `subtitle` varchar(255) default NULL, `autor` varchar(40) default NULL, `introduction` text, `maintext` text, `time_active` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `time_start` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `time_end` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `time_r_active` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `time_r_monthdays` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `time_r_weekdays` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `time_r_months` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `time_r_start` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `time_r_end` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `creation_date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `creation_user` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `mod_date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `mod_user` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `image` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `image_version` varchar(11) default NULL, `image_link` varchar(255) default NULL, `image_link_target` varchar(20) default NULL, `image_zoom` tinyint(1) unsigned default '0', `locked` tinyint(1) unsigned default '0', `locked_user` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `locked_date` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `rid` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `lang` char(3) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`lang`) )ENGINE=MyISAM ; alter table `{TABLE.articles}` add column `display_time_type` int (1) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0' NOT NULL after `lang`; alter table `{TABLE.articles}` add column `display_time_start` int (11) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0' NOT NULL after `display_time_type`; alter table `{TABLE.articles}` add column `display_time_end` int (11) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0' NOT NULL after `display_time_start`; alter table `{TABLE.articles}` add column `hide_title` int (1) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0' NULL after `title`; alter table `{TABLE.articles}` add column `date` int (11) NULL after `subtitle`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{TABLE.articles_tree}` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `l` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `r` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `pid` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `level` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `tree_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `l` (`l`), KEY `r` (`r`), KEY `level` (`level`), KEY `pid` (`pid`) )ENGINE=MyISAM ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{TABLE.articles_tree_details}` ( `node_id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `lang` char(3) NOT NULL default '', `creation_date` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `creation_user` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `mod_date` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `mod_user` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `active` tinyint(4) NOT NULL default '0', `download_count` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `md5` varchar(32) NOT NULL default '', `isFolder` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '1', `public` tinyint(1) unsigned default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`node_id`,`lang`) )ENGINE=MyISAM ;
ALTER TABLE `{TABLE.articles_tree_details}` ADD `image` int(11); ALTER TABLE `{TABLE.articles_tree_details}` ADD `image_version` int(11);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{TABLE.articles_chapters}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `title` varchar(255) default NULL, `subtitle` varchar(255) default NULL, `maintext` text, `level` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL default '1', `image` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `image_version` varchar(11) default NULL, `image_link` varchar(255) default NULL, `image_link_target` varchar(20) default NULL, `image_zoom` tinyint(1) unsigned default '0', `rid` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `lang` char(3) NOT NULL default '', `layout` varchar(255) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`level`,`lang`) )ENGINE=MyISAM ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{TABLE.articles_v}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `title` varchar(255) default NULL, `subtitle` varchar(255) default NULL, `autor` varchar(40) default NULL, `introduction` text, `maintext` text, `time_active` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `time_start` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `time_end` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `time_r_active` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `time_r_monthdays` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `time_r_weekdays` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `time_r_months` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `time_r_start` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `time_r_end` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `creation_date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `creation_user` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `mod_date` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `mod_user` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `image` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `image_version` varchar(11) default NULL, `image_link` varchar(255) default NULL, `image_link_target` varchar(20) default NULL, `image_zoom` tinyint(1) unsigned default '0', `locked` tinyint(1) unsigned default '0', `locked_user` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `locked_date` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `rid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `published` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `latest` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `lang` char(3) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`rid`,`lang`) )ENGINE=MyISAM ; alter table `{TABLE.articles_v}` add column `display_time_type` int (1) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0' NOT NULL after `lang`; alter table `{TABLE.articles_v}` add column `display_time_start` int (11) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0' NOT NULL after `display_time_type`; alter table `{TABLE.articles_v}` add column `display_time_end` int (11) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0' NOT NULL after `display_time_start`; alter table `{TABLE.articles_v}` add column `hide_title` int (1) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0' NULL after `title`; alter table `{TABLE.articles_v}` add column `date` int (11) NULL after `subtitle`;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{TABLE.articles_chapters_v}` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `active` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `title` varchar(255) default NULL, `subtitle` varchar(255) default NULL, `maintext` text, `level` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL default '1', `image` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `image_version` varchar(11) default NULL, `image_link` varchar(255) default NULL, `image_link_target` varchar(20) default NULL, `image_zoom` tinyint(1) unsigned default '0', `rid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `published` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `lang` char(3) NOT NULL default '', `layout` varchar(255) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`level`,`rid`,`lang`) )ENGINE=MyISAM ;
